# 二分

## 二分 
1. 小于等于目标得最后一个
```cpp
while(l < r){
    int mid = l + r +1 >>1;
    if(a[mid] <= target) l = mid;
    else r = mid - 1;
}

int res = l >=0 ?a[l] : -1;
```
2. 小于目标得最后一个
```cpp
while(l<r){
    int mid = l + r >>1;
    if(a[mid] < target)l = mid;
    else r = mid - 1;
}
int res = l >=0 ?a[l] : -1;
```
3. 大于等于目标最后一个
```cpp
while(l < r){
    int mid = l + r >> 1;
    if(a[mid] < target)l = mid + 1;
    else r = mid;
}
```

4. 大于目标第一个
```cpp
while(l< r){
    int mid = l + r >> 1;
    if(a[mid] <= target) l = mid + 1;
    else r = mid;
}

```



1. 寻找峰值 162
2.
